title: Anyone experiencing random lag?
body:
It happens randomly from time to time and it is amazingly annoying.
Started to Happen quite recently.
The lag initially occurs little by little and eventually freezes everyone including the minions in the game (on my screen).
Everyone is teleporting, I can't chat, I can't buy any items, minions are not dying, people die all of sudden.
And more interesting thing is that my ping and FPS is about 20 ms and 160.
So... Rito, could you explain what is causing the lag?

If I do not lag, someone in team lags and leaves.
And it takes ages to recover or never.
Have lost quite a few games recently because of the lag.
Guess lol is not the game for fun anymore.

Now I regret I bought the new project skins...

And I am not even sure which board to put this...
Does rito even know about this crazy issue?

replies.body: I get that problem quite a lot too. It is something call massive packet loss if i remember correctly.

This is what is happening to me exactly I even called up my internet provider (Telstra) because the same issue was happening to me when I had Optus so I switched to Telstra and still the same thing when I called them up they told me it's the program that you are using it must be lagging because your internet is fine on our screen even my google, youtube, facebook etc.... isn't lagging only when I play League and it happens randomly as well.
